reviews.text: Food was very good and fresh ... Service was wonderful

Saturday at lunchtime is crazyyyy busy and you‚Äôll need to go with plenty of time to enjoy your food. Tight seating tables but servers were running ragged as it was seriously a hot spot to eat! Menu is HUGE! Some of our food was really hot, others not so much but you get a TON of food and all was very good. No complaints basically and we‚Äôd def will go again.
Staff was really nice and patient. The food was really tasty and the portions were bigger than what I expected! Very satisfied, I'd recommend it
nice simple restaurant, food was ok and service as well
Perfect spot for a night out. Loved the vibe and the menu.
A big cockroach landed on my table. It fell from the ceiling. We chased it around and eventually crushed it. Pretty gross experience.
Food ok Service needs a 10% Boost or Get additional Help - Cook Prepper or Waiter.

Cafecito top
Coffe top
The food is amazing ! It warms your heart and fills your stomach  ü§©

Buenisima comida y servicio
A local eatery. I have been only for breakfast. I keep on going back, so they must be doing something right.
What a great place!! Food is great, service, too, It is full of atmosphere,  so come!

i literally love this place i couldn't say enough good things about it if i tried! they're so nice and friendly to you as soon as you walk in, it always puts a smile on my face i feel like family. i always get an omelette and it's one of my fav omelette in the city, no frills diner style, not dry at all, and comes with really yummy home fries with onions and peppers. the portions are pretty big but priced very reasonably and it's wayyyy better than the diner across the street

This is for a take out order. I'm pretty easy to please but I was looking for comfort food and ordered a patty melt and disco fries. This order was inedible- soggy, greasy bread, tasteless meat and disgusting fries. If I had been to see I would have refused it. Know how to send food hot and crisp, not soggy and falling apart and swimming in grease. Love the owners but do better. Gross!

As ‚ÄúFrench toasts‚Äù tinham sabor de estragado.
As panquecas tinham gosto de ferro. Sem sabor real de panquecas.
Os ovos vinham com restos de casca do ovo.
O servi√ßo √© m√©dio mas a comida foi p√©ssima. Tive que deixar a comida no prato.
Restaurant normal sense cap pretensi√≥.
We waited a while for our food, but it was a super busy morning.  Everyone was friendly and yhe food was delicious!
Quick service.

Breakfast burritos were so delicious! All of them. If you around the area, you can‚Äôt miss it! 100% worth it. Our server Rosa was super nice and made sure we were completely satisfied. Excellent customer service.
One of the best, possibly the best, diner burger I have ever had.

Tr√®s bon accueil et tr√®s bonne cuisine.
Nous avons mang√© des p√¢tes qu'ils servent avec du pain toast√© avec du pesto.
Bonne adresse √† Brooklyn.Non rapport qualit√© prix et accueil sympa
Excellent breakfast, expansive menu with something for everyone
Love this Place. Always spend my whole day off there.
Nice place. Good food. Definitely try again.
Great service!
Asked for a club turkey sandwich and got a blt but charged for a turkey club .
Nous avons bien mang√©, restaurant am√©ricain agr√©able, moins tape √† l'oeil que certains mais on s'est r√©gal√©s.
Burger was great!
A+ burgers! Didn‚Äôt try anything else on the menu at my table but the burgers. They were spot on. Good fries too. 95$ tips and tax in for 3 beers and 3 burgers with fries, definitely worth it!
I asked for a well cooked burger they gave it 2 me medium rare to 2 times.
Original mexikanisches Restaurant. Tolles Ambiente, sehr leckeres Essen und die Bedienung ist auch sehr nett. Immer wieder gerne üòÉ
Definitely on the pricey side, but it is Brooklyn Heights! Food and drinks are great. They even have a Vegan Section on the menu. Super friendly staff, wonderful service.
Servers were nice and friendly and the food was cooked to perfection. Well worth the visit
I love the Mexican omelette‚Äîit‚Äôs pretty much the only thing I get because it‚Äôs so good. In the summer, they offer outdoor seating right in the front and it‚Äôs so nice.
Excellent service, food, and at good prices! I had a very enjoyable experience and I will be coming back!

Went to this restaurant late at night and wasn‚Äôt too busy. I got the burrito and it was honestly just alright. The rice was good but the chicken was kind of bland. Pretty good size burrito though. It was about $20 so very overpriced for what you get. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend coming here unless there‚Äôs a specific food they have that other restaurants don‚Äôt have nearby.
I love this diner man! The staff are so friendly and genuinely want to give their customers a good experience. My coffee is always full and fresh, food is good and comes out fast.

We love Grand Canyon. Great neighborhood diner food and feel, plus a lot of great Mexican flourishes on the menu as well.

Caesar and Victor, the proprietors, are always friendly and welcoming, as is the rest of the staff.

Just exactly what I hope for in a diner.
I had a grilled chicken sandwich with fries.  It was tasty and was a good-sized portion.
Great service and breakfast burrito!

Biased cause I went here right after I got married at city hall.

But the staff is great. The food was pretty solid.

Would go again.
First time here, my friends live in the neighborhood and took my family here, can't recommend it enough.

Sehr gutes mexikanisch-amerikanisches Essen, riesige Auswahl und richtig gute Portionen! Preisleistung wirklich top, g√ºnstiger als gewohnt  f√ºr New York City! Sehr gem√ºtlich und freundlicher Service! Weiterempfehlung!!!
First time in Brooklyn and this restaurant was family friendly and inviting. I visited twice while there. Customer service was amazing!!!
I used to go to this restaurant a lot for years. It's now reconstructed under new management. The quality of the food is just not the same. Nor is the service - A Total different atmosphere.
Best diner on the block
I have been coming to this diner for over 30 years. Always good and reliable. Would definitely recommend.

Most pleasant diner experience you‚Äôll find in Brooklyn Heights. Clark Street is bright, Montague Diner has overpriced cache, and Grand Canyon has the fastest, most kind service with equally if not better food. They really aim to make you happy. Love their Healthy Breakfast Wrap - just the right amount of everything!
Favorite diner on Montague!

This is always a must-visit restaurant whenever I‚Äôm in NY. I usually stop in for breakfast, but this time I tried the vibe salad, and it was absolutely delicious. The restaurant is nestled in a cool little neighborhood downtown, offering a variety of options for breakfast, lunch, and dinner. Definitely a top choice

Beautiful spot in Downtown Brooklyn for the good old diner experience! Warm
Welcome and very accommodating!

They catered our work pre Mother‚Äôs Day brunch and it was delicious and everyone loved it!

Check them out! They have an extensive menu!

Arnaque ! Restaurant qui s'accorde des TIPS alors m√™me que nous les avons refus√© !!! Honteux et scandaleux ! Je vais cr√©er une contestation de paiement carte car malheureusement pour vous (et heureusement pour moi j'ai gard√© la preuve du ticket que je vous ai remis).
Nous avons √©t√© d√©bit√© de 141.98 dollars alors m√™me que notre ticket est de 124.34 dollars et que nous n'avions pas donn√© de tips au vu des frais "service charge" de 18% d√©j√† inclus et que notre Apple Pay est bien de 124.34 dollars ainsi que votre ticket que nous avons sign√©.
Honteux ! Restaurant qui ne m√©rite pas d √™tre visit√© !
Je n'ai pas l'habitude de mettre des notes n√©gatives mais l√† c'est honteux !!!
Preuve √† l'appui en photos ! Paiement de notre apple Pay + ticket d'origine + d√©pense d√©bit√©e sur notre compte.

I had to change my review. This place is so good that, I came in on a Sunday to eat with friends. The fries are to die for.. the service is pretty good, the dining area is really nice and the bathrooms are clean. I totally recommend this spot. It‚Äôs becoming one of my go to spots after coming here like over fifteen times.

If you‚Äôre looking for a diner vibe in a big city, this is it! I‚Äôve passed this spot so many times but happen to end up here on a Friday b/c it was one of the few spots open for lunch. The food was as good. But the pineapple mimosas were better.
This place is so beautiful üòç the customer service and food is amazing and the music had my family dancing. We thank you for having us yesterday üôè.
Highly recommended family-friendly traditional restaurant with a large diverse menu with good affordable food. Great customer service. Clean with comfortable seating.
What a great restaurant. I had the walnut salad with grilled chicken! 5 stars! You won‚Äôt be disappointed at this restaurant. They have so many choices. Staff was friendly and welcoming.

What a wonderful restaurant.
Service and food were excellent and the vibe of the restaurant is chilled and welcoming.
We ordered the jack cheese burger deluxe meal and breaded chicken wrap, with both meals being spot on.

My wife and I ate here and it was amazing! They have almost anything you could imagine. The menu goes on and on! I got the chicken burrito, my wife got the veggie nachos and they were the bomb! One of the best burritos I've had.

Relaxed place with a huge menu suitable for all day long eating.
Atmosphere and the know how of the service are impressive.
Prices are also a strong point for what you'll get.
Definatelly a yes.
Delicious all around, but this was definitely picture worthy! Pier 4 breakfast burrito is my new favorite breakfast item!

This would be my first choice for diner style food on Montague Street. Originally, we were going to to to a place across the street but were met with no acknowledgment, insane wait times and an attitude.

Walked in here, no wait and greeted warmly. Everyone was so nice, professional and patient. Decor is super cool too, nice vibes all around. Plus the food is delicious and the portions are big. Lentil soup was soooo good!

A bit of a schlep for me but will definitely come back if I'm in the area!
Great chill diner in a good location in Brooklyn Heights! Love the hashbrowns.

We brought a party of 15, including 6 kids, for a birthday brunch on my daughter's 9th birthday. The staff was awesome! Super friendly, efficient, and accommodating. The kids happily devoured pancakes and birthday cake while the parents enjoyed solid brunch food. Big shout out to Rosa, our server, who was incredible, friendly, and helpful. Thanks for making the day a huge success!
Stopped n post run and hot the feta and avocado breakfast burrito. Terrific!! And the staff couldn't have been more kind (c photo). I'll b back!
Gezellig Mexicaans restaurant in Brooklyn. Heerlijke wraps en sandwiches gegeten. Vriendelijk personeel bovendien.
Gratamente sorprendida! Excelente servicio, agradables y profesionales. Muy buenas las recomendaciones. Muchas gracias!!!

This place is amazing. The folks who work there are lovely. The diner food is exactly what you want it to be and don‚Äôt skip the Mexican page of the menu, it‚Äôs so good! I feel so lucky to have this place in my neighborhood.

Great diner with excellent food! Went here on my last day in NYC because I still had going to an American diner on my checklist. And it was absolutely great! Cosy atmosphere, tasty food and big portions for a fair price. I had a Cheese Burger which tasted really fresh. The staff were a little busy but still very friendly. Would love to come back and try some of the Mexican dishes.
I love this place for their huge fresh ground beef burgers with Steak fries! A true gem located in a beautiful neighborhood w/outdoor seating. Spring/summer days are awesome.
Great place, great flavour, great staff. Brooklyn heights sandwich was amazing.

Came here with a host of friends from around the world, and we all loved it. It's easily my favorite dining experience in NYC - it might be a strange recommendation, but the strawberry lemonade is to die for.

Wir waren heute dort fr√ºhst√ºcken. Wir wurden sehr freundlich bedient, nur zu empfehlen. Kaffee wird kostenlos nachgef√ºllt und die Portionen sind mehr als ausreichend. Bester Start in den Tag. PS: viele New Yorker dort... das spricht f√ºr sich. Perfekt.

I‚Äôve come here a few times, no issue. Today I brought my daughter. Everything was fine, except a Mexican sandwich she ordered. It had no taste really and the meat was very dry. So we sent it back. Instead of bringing a better sandwich or apologizing in any way. They simply brought the check with the sandwich still on it. Not even an attempt to satisfy the customer. I asked the waiter, who then got nasty with me, and said, ‚Äúgo talk to the owner!‚Äù

So I went up to him. He was rude, unreasonable, disrespectful. ‚ÄúNo one has ever had a complaint.‚Äù So? The meat was dry and the taste was not good. He didn‚Äôt care. I then said, ‚Äú I‚Äôm not paying for it.‚Äù This is how you handle customer service?

I paid the bill. Less the amount of the bad sandwich. And simply handed it to the waiter.  Who really did not deserve my very good tip.

The prices are insanely expensive. To give you an idea. Just a side salad is $10.00.

I will not go there again.
